Angie Bowen's Digital Garden

⚠️ Note: This version of the website is in early development and not yet public. The current public version is at angiebowen.com.

Features

  • Built with Eleventy
  • Hand-coded HTML & CSS
  • No tracking, ads, or affiliate links

Roadmap

  • [x] Basic site layout and templates
  • [ ] Implement unobtrusive icon set
  • [ ] Finish initial content and posts
